4666.verse: وَكَمْ|And how many|117|136|6245$أَهْلَكْنَا|We destroyed|112|150|5422$قَبْلَهُم|before them|100|138|11274$مِّن|of|50|88|53$قَرْنٍ|a generation,|108|146|11275$هُمْ|they|50|69|49$أَشَدُّ|(were) stronger|124|135|711$مِنْهُم|than them|88|110|730$بَطْشًا|(in) power.|93|115|15450$فَنَقَّبُواْ|so they explored|130|152|16088$فِى|throughout|93|115|89$ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ|the lands.|86|97|3645$هَلْ|Is (there)|84|186|1829$مِن|any|50|254|53$مَّحِيصٍ|place of escape?|132|234|9583$

4668.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly,|112|134|640$خَلَقْنَا|We created|97|142|7029$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|160|351$وَٱلْأَرْضَ|and the earth|111|156|2280$وَمَا|and whatever|111|133|46$بَيْنَهُمَا|(is) between both of them|195|205|3978$فِى|in|48|68|89$سِتَّةِ|six|57|76|6450$أَيَّامٍ|periods,|72|92|1585$وَمَا|and (did) not|107|126|46$مَسَّنَا|touch Us|79|98|9234$مِن|any|50|60|53$لُّغُوبٍ|fatigue.|77|77|16091$

4670.verse: وَمِنَ|And of|64|94|74$ٱلَّيْلِ|the night|80|139|1418$فَسَبِّحْهُ|glorify Him|88|147|16093$وَأَدْبَـٰرَ|and after|83|142|16094$ٱلسُّجُودِ|the prostration.|124|154|1151$

4672.verse: يَوْمَ|(The) Day|87|106|1057$يَسْمَعُونَ|they will hear|109|147|731$ٱلصَّيْحَةَ|the Blast|98|136|16098$بِٱلْحَقِّ‌ۚ|in truth.|78|116|692$ذَٲلِكَ|That|64|102|28$يَوْمُ|(is the) Day|99|118|5399$ٱلْخُرُوجِ|(of) coming forth.|138|138|16099$

4673.verse: إِنَّا|Indeed, We|96|121|120$نَحْنُ|[We]|62|112|103$نُحْىِۦ|[We] give life|109|159|9747$وَنُمِيتُ|and [We] cause death,|174|224|9748$وَإِلَيْنَا|and to Us|84|109|11197$ٱلْمَصِيرُ|(is) the final return.|151|151|1162$

4675.verse: نَّحْنُ|We|62|76|103$أَعْلَمُ|know best|88|115|324$بِمَا|[of] what|83|110|43$يَقُولُونَ‌ۖ|they say,|88|115|753$وَمَآ|and not|71|98|46$أَنتَ|(are) you|82|109|341$عَلَيْهِم|over them|87|101|22$بِجَبَّارٍ‌ۖ|the one to compel.|146|154|16102$فَذَكِّرْ|But remind|90|105|16103$بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ|with the Quran|119|134|11650$مَن|whoever|76|91|76$يَخَافُ|fears|77|92|11645$وَعِيدِ|My threat.|90|98|9557$

4680.verse: إِنَّمَا|Indeed, what|108|188|102$تُوعَدُونَ|you are promised|133|294|6059$لَصَادِقٌ|(is) surely true,|123|203|16110$

4681.verse: وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|179|713$ٱلدِّينَ|the Judgment|110|272|1208$لَوَٲقِعٌ|(is) surely to occur.|152|233|16111$

4666.verse: And how many a generation before them did We destroy who were greater than them in [striking] power and had explored throughout the lands. Is there any place of escape?

4667.verse: Indeed in that is a reminder for whoever has a heart or who listens while he is present [in mind].

4668.verse: And We did certainly create the heavens and earth and what is between them in six days, and there touched Us no weariness.

4669.verse: So be patient, [O Muhammad], over what they say and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting,

4670.verse: And [in part] of the night exalt Him and after prostration.

4671.verse: And listen on the Day when the Caller will call out from a place that is near -

4672.verse: The Day they will hear the blast [of the Horn] in truth. That is the Day of Emergence [from the graves].

4673.verse: Indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and to Us is the destination

4674.verse: On the Day the earth breaks away from them [and they emerge] rapidly; that is a gathering easy for Us.

4675.verse: We are most knowing of what they say, and you are not over them a tyrant. But remind by the Qur'an whoever fears My threat.

4677.verse: And those [clouds] carrying a load [of water]

4680.verse: Indeed, what you are promised is true.

4681.verse: And indeed, the recompense is to occur.
